column2: thank you for the constructive note about our service. I think you can agree that when the house gets full
column3: the energy in the space becomes fast-paced and sometimes a little hectic. It is these times I often remind the servers to slow down
column4: take a breath and focus on the details
column5: mostly to head off potential mistakes. As you might imagine
column6: this is often easier said than done. But we do our best to get things done as quickly as possible and with as few errors as possible. And lastly
column7: much appreciation for your kind words regarding our food
column8: though let's agree to disagree on our gyoza! Thank you again
column9: and we look forward to serving you again soon.
